law.catch_line: The State's Attorneys of the several counties are charged with the duty of seeing that such trusts a...
law.text: The State's Attorneys of the several counties are charged with the duty of seeing that such trusts are carried into effect in their respective counties; and in case of any neglect on the part of the county commissioners, it shall be the duty of the State's Attorney in the county in which such neglect occurs to cause proper proceedings to be instituted in the circuit court for said county to compel the execution of the said trust.
